title: How.to.Survive.Repack-R.G.Mechanics

Publisher: 505 Games
Publication Type: RePack
Game Language: Eng |Rus

Crack: SKIDROW



System Requirements:

Operating system: Windows XP (32-Bit), Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8
Processor: 2.2 Ghz Dual Core / 2.8 GHz Quad Core
Memory: 4 GB
Video: 512 MB Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Ã¢â‚¬â€¹compatible with DirectX 9
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX 9.0

Game information:


How to Survive - zombie survival shooter, which is set on a remote
archipelago off the coast of Colombia. Together with other survivors
you have to deal with the search for food, water and shelter, as well
as crafting a variety of devices and weapons. Players can join with
others in local or online multiplayer to progress through the story,
or for testing, where it is necessary to stand against
the growing crowds infected.

Repack Features:

How to Survive
Includes Update 9
Do not cut / recoded

Additions:

Heat Wave DLC - Abby's pack;
Heat Wave DLC - Kenji's pack;
Heat Wave DLC - Jack's pack;
Heat Wave DLC - x 3 pack;
Kovac's Way;
Hello my name is Nina;
El Diablo Islands
